description:
Running is all about your feet pounding the pavement, so anything you can do to help ease up on that pressure can make your endeavor that much more enjoyable. That’s where these Trail Run Crew Socks come in. With the 4 Degree Elite fit system, mesh zones for added breathability, and a Virtually Seamless toe, this sock brings the comfort. So whether you’re on mile 1 or mile 20, you can focus on the run and not your feet.

  • Indestructawool™ technology with extended durability zones
  • 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a dialed-in, performance-oriented fit
  • Shred Shield™ technology reduces wear from toes
  • Mesh zones for added breathability
  • Virtually Seamless™ toe for enhanced comfort
name: Smartwool Athlete Edition Run Crew Socks - Unisex
